article.headline: Furman 89, Erskine 51
article.story: GREENVILLE, S.C. (AP) -- Quan Prowell had 16 points and 9 rebounds to lead Furman in an 89-51 victory over Erskine on Tuesday night. Moussa Diagne and Robby Bostain added 13 each for the Paladins (8-4), who have beaten the Flying Fleet 22 straight times. They lead the series 29-6. Bobby Isom scored 14 to lead Erskine (4-4). The Fleet took an 11-5 lead in the first five minutes, but Furman used a 25-2 run over the next six minutes to go up 30-13. Prowell scored 12 points during the run, including a 3-pointer that put Furman ahead for good at 14-11. Furman increased its lead to 23 by halftime and opened the second half with an 11-3 run for a 60-29 lead on Tony Carter's 3-pointer with 15 minutes to go. The Paladins led by 31 or more the rest of the game.
